name: Blob Tactics
description:
Our first Unity game!  Simply destroy the red blobs using your blue blobs.  Note that this game requires a mouse for the best experience.

Instructions:

  • Left-click: Select blob/Increase stats/Drag Camera
  • Double left-click: Zoom in on blob
  • Right-click: Move selected blob
  • Scroll: Zoom in/out

Stats:

  • Range: Increasing this will allow a blob to interact with blobs that are further away
  • Strength: Increasing this will make a blob shoot enemy blobs faster
  • Speed: Increasing this will make a blob move faster
  • Aptitude: Increasing this will make a blob gain skill points faster
  • Healing: Increasing this will make a blob heal fellow blobs faster
  • Fertility: Increasing this will make a blob shoot hearts (reproduce) faster

Power-ups:

  • Purple Dots make a blob bigger
  • Black Dots make a blob smaller
  • Orange Dots give a blob a skill point
